title: Catch Up With Ketchup
itunes:title: Catch Up With Ketchup
description:
Today on the show, we got word during "Front Page News" that the Ketchup brand Heinz is in debt, and we just wanted to know how, since that is the main ketchup brand, according to DJ Envy. So we opened up the phone lines to see if our listeners use any different brand and if they keep it in the refrigerator or the cabinet. Moreover, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to Chief Executive of the New England Patriots Robert Kraft for  paying for sex acts. Also, we opened up the phone lines to see if any of our listeners ever did the same thing. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Today on the show, we got word during "Front Page News" that the Ketchup brand Heinz is in debt, and we just wanted to know how, since that is the main ketchup brand, according to DJ Envy. So we opened up the phone lines to see if our listeners use any different brand and if they keep it in the refrigerator or the cabinet. Moreover, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to Chief Executive of the New England Patriots Robert Kraft for  paying for sex acts. Also, we opened up the phone lines to see if any of our listeners ever did the same thing. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
